title: The Oldest wonder
brief_description: This film investigates the development of the pyramid shape for the Egyptian tombs, and how it was possible to build the Great Pyramid within thirty years. The myths surrounding the pyramids are explored and the scientific techniques used to explore them are examined. Narrated by Magnus Magnussen.
